text:
e="preserve">Igor Borisovich Moskvin (; 30 August 1929 – 10 November 2020) was a Russian figure skating coach and competitor. He represented the Soviet Union in pair skating with his partner Maya Belenkaya. He became a three-time Soviet national champion from 1952 to 1954.
He was an Honoured Master of Sports of the USSR and Honored Coach of the USSR. He was born in Bezhitsa, Bryansk Oblast.
Moskvin died in Saint Petersburg, Russia on 10 November 2020 after a serious illness at the age of 91.

annotations.surface_form: Honoured Master of Sports of the USSR
